net.ltgt.mid.bpi
Class BpiDecoder

java.lang.Object
  net.ltgt.mid.bpi.BpiDecoder
public class BpiDecoder
extends java.lang.Object

Decodes images stored in a DataInputStream in BPI format. Images can be returned as Image or directly rendered on a Graphics object.

Author:
Thomas Broyer

Constructor Detail

BpiDecoder

public BpiDecoder(java.io.DataInputStream dis)
Creates a new instance of BpiDecoder

Parameters:
dis - The DataInputStream to read images from.
Method Detail

readColorModel

public void readColorModel()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Reads a BPI color model from the underlying stream. The BPI color model is set as the current color model for the following calls to readRaster or createImage.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured when reading from the underlying stream.

readImage

public javax.microedition.lcdui.Image readImage()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Reads a image from the underlying stream using the current color model and returns it as an Image.

Returns:
The decoded image.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured when reading from the underlying stream.
See Also:
readColorModel()

readImage

public void readImage(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int anchor)
               throws java.io.IOException
Reads an image from the underlying stream using the current color model and renderes it directly to the provided Graphics.

Parameters:
g - the Graphics object to render to.
x - the x coordinate of the anchor point.
y - the y coordinate of the anchor point.
anchor - the anchor point for positioning the image.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured when reading from the underlying stream.

Sets the current color model.

readRaster

public BpiRaster readRaster()
                     throws java.io.IOException
Reads a raster (image size and pixel data) from the underlying stream and returns it as a BpiRaster.

Returns:
the read raster.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occured when reading reading from the underlying stream.

createImage

public javax.microedition.lcdui.Image createImage(BpiRaster raster)
Creates an Image from the current color model and the provided raster.

Parameters:
raster - the raster to decode the image from.
Returns:
the decoded image.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the raster pixel size is not compatible with the current color model.
See Also:
setColorModel(BpiColorModel)

createImage

public void createImage(BpiRaster raster,
                        javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int anchor)
Decodes an image from the current color model and the provided raster and renders it directly to the provided Graphics.

Parameters:
raster - the raster to decode the image from.
g - the Graphics object to render to.
x - the x coordinate of the anchor point.
y - the y coordinate of the anchor point.
anchor - the anchor point for positioning the image.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the raster pixel size is not compatible with the current color model.
See Also:
setColorModel(BpiColorModel)
